summary: Leave your criminal past behind by using the face sculptor found in Riften.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/hmVTwLA.png[/img]

1. [b]Description[/b]
2. [b]Installation[/b]
3. [b]Compatibility[/b]
4. [b]Recommended Mods[/b]
5. [b]Credits[/b]

1. [color=#993333][b]Description[/b][/color]

Leave your criminal past behind by using the face sculptor found in Riften!

I've always found skyrim lacking in an immersive way to lose a bounty without getting yourself caught. This mod makes it so that the using the face sculptor in Riften removes all current bounties placed on the player's head. The price of surgery will also increase with player bounty.

2. [color=#993333][b]Installation[/b][/color]

Drop Replace Your Criminal Face.esp into your Skyrim Data folder. I recommend doing this with your favorite mod manager. Requires Dawnguard.

3. [color=#993333][b]Compatibility[/b][/color]

Won't be compatible with mods that edit the face sculptor or the surgery quest.

4. [color=#993333]Recommended Mods[/color]

[url="http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24187"]Vinis Crime Gold[/url]

5. [color=#993333][b]Credits[/b][/color]

Thanks to jeclxohko on the Bethsoft forums for the idea!
http://forums.bethsoft.com/topic/1472709-mod-conceptidea-the-face-sculptor/
author: SilentSpike

files.name: Replace Your Criminal Face
files.changelogHtml:
Changed scripting entirely to add support for mods which add new crime factions to the crimefactions list (including dragonborn)
Added calming effect to essential NPCs in riften (should prevent them from staying hostile in rare instances where the player has attacked them just before undergoing surgery)
Accounted for rare cases where the player is in combat during surgery. (Will deny you surgery)
